public class roots{
    public static void main(String args[]){
        int a,b,c;
        float x1,x2;
        int check;
        a=1;b=-2;c=1;
        check=b*b-4*a*c;
        if(check==0){
            x1=(-b)/(2*a);
            x2=x1;
            System.out.println("x1="+x1);
            System.out.println("x2="+x2);
        }
     else
        if (check>0) {
          x1=(-b+(float)Math.sqrt(check))/(2*a);
          x2=(-b-(float)Math.sqrt(check))/(2*a);
          System.out.println("x1="+x1);
          System.out.println("x2="+x2);
         }
         else
         {   /*è¯·è‡ªå·±å¡«å†™*/   }
     } }

public class  Loop_Loop {
    public static void main(String args[]) {
      int I,J,K;
      System.out.println(" I    J    K ");
      for  (I=0;I<=20;I++ )
       { for ( J=0;J<=33;J++)
            { K=100-I-J;                
              if (5*I+3*J+K/3.0==100)         //æ³¨æ„â€œK/3.0â€
              System.out.println(I+"   "+J+"   "+K);
            } 
       }
   }  
}

public class ConDemo{
public static void main(String args[]){

 {

public class ArithmeticOp{
    public static void main(String args[ ]){
       int a,b,c;
       a=b=c=2;
       a=++b - ++c;     //0 3 3
       System.out.printlnï¼ˆâ€³a=â€³+a+â€³b=â€³+b+â€³c=â€³+cï¼‰;
       a =b++ + c++;    //6 4 4
       System.out.printlnï¼ˆâ€³a=â€³+a+â€³b=â€³+b+â€³c=â€³+cï¼‰;
       a =b-- + c--;    //8 3 3
       System.out.printlnï¼ˆâ€³a=â€³+a+â€³b=â€³+b+â€³c=â€³+cï¼‰;
     }
}

public class TestSwitch{
    public static void main(String args[ ]){
       int  x=1,y=2,i=0,j=0;
       switch(x){
          case 1: switch(y){
                   case 1: i++;
                   break;
                   case 2: j++;
                   break;
                   default:i++;
                    j++;}           //i=0 j=1

          case 2: i++;
                  j++;              //i=1 j=2
                  break;
          default:i++;
                  j++;
       }
      System.out.println("i="+i);
      System.out.println("j="+j);
    }                              //i=1
}                                  //j=2
